author: USA TODAY, Lindsay Schnell and John Bacon, USA TODAY
title: Coronavirus live updates: Trump suggests reopening in weeks; $2 trillion stimulus bill stalled; Wuhan to lift lockdown; US deaths near 600
description: Donald Trump says he wants to return to normal sooner rather than later. The U.S. death toll is near 600. Wuhan, China will lift its lockdown April 8.
content:
An epidemiologist answers the biggest questions she's getting about coronavirus.
Wochit
As of early Tuesday, the U.S. had more than 46,000 confirmed cases, trailing only Italy and China. New York alone has more than 23,000 cases. Experts say confirmed cases… [+7916 chars]
